problem_text_cn: 如图,A、D是电线杆AB上的两个瓷壶,AC和DE分别表示太阳光线,若某一时刻线段AD在地面上的影长CE=1m,BD在地面上的影长BE=3m,瓷壶D到地面的距离DB=20m,则电线杆AB的高为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, A and D are the two porcelain pots on the telephone pole AB, AC and DE respectively represent the sun rays. If the shadow length of the line segment AD on the ground at a certain time CE = N_0, the shadow length of BD on the ground BE = N_1, the distance from the porcelain pot D to the ground DB = N_2, then the height of the telephone pole AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵太阳光线是平行的,∴AC∥DE,∴△BDE∽△BAC,∴\frac{BD}{AB}=\frac{BE}{BC},∵BE=3m,CE=1m,∴BC=4m,∴\frac{20}{AB}=\frac{3}{4},解得:AB=\frac{80}{3}．故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了相似三角形的应用,解题的关键是从实际问题中整理出相似三角形,难度不大．
